title: Olimp2009
author: Olimp2009
content: Our project is the launch offline marketing strategy in Asia, India, Vietnam and Africa. We are looking for experienced professionals who understand cryptocurrency.We are a big ecosystem with many useful features. Our main bias is privacy. We have a unique browser and messenger with the best encryption system! We have our own content creation platform. And many other things that set us apart from other projects!What we need:- promotion of our messenger- Explaining the essence of the product- scaling the promotion- audience gathering- reporting- Attending conferences and all cryptocurrency related events in your region.Experience working with cryptocurrency-oriented audiences is a must.If you are located in Asia, India, Vietnam and Africa and think you would be a good fit for this position, please post your experience in this thread and leave your contacts. (this is the preferred method)You can also message me on Telegram @JoBraver

comments.author: Olimp2009
comments.body: I'm still waiting to hear from you. Write to me if you live in Asian or African regions

comments.author: Olimp2009
comments.body: We are continuing our search. If you are located in these regions, please contact me. Absolutely everyone is welcome and we are willing to consider any candidate.
